raw_beliefs.text: Raising the minimum wage helps workers afford basic necessities and reduces poverty
Higher minimum wages force small businesses to cut jobs or close entirely
Studies show modest minimum wage increases have minimal impact on employment
Workers deserve a living wage that keeps up with inflation and cost of living
Student loan debt prevents young people from buying homes, starting businesses, and building wealth
Loan forgiveness is unfair to those who already paid off their loans or chose not to attend college
Forgiving loans without fixing the underlying system will just create the same problem again
An educated population benefits society as a whole and should be publicly supported
